mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qs_case_basic ( ID, Parent_number, Project_name, Stop_flag, Stop_Comment, Record_time, Organization_id, Organization, Only_id, mr_id, In_number, Patient_name, Patient_Id_card, Birthday, in_time, out_time, standard_subject, Out_way, Diag_code, Diagnoss, Ops_code, Operation, Cost ) VALUES ( #{ID}, #{Parent_number}, #{Project_name}, #{Stop_flag}, #{Stop_Comment}, #{Record_time}, #{Organization_id}, #{Organization}, #{Only_id}, #{mr_id}, #{In_number}, #{Patient_name}, #{Patient_Id_card}, #{Birthday}, #{in_time}, #{out_time}, #{standard_subject}, #{Out_way}, #{Diag_code}, #{Diagnoss}, #{Ops_code}, #{Operation}, #{Cost} )
